description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
http://gotosthlm.com

Rodrigue Schaefer - Head of Engineering at Zalando

ABSTRACT
In this talk, Head of Engineering Rodrigue Schaefer will discuss some of the challenges of Zalando's transition from monolith to microservices and how the company’s engineering team has tackled them through a combination of organizational [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotosthlm.com/2016/sessions/7
